ResourceHeader.Description: EMCCD station at Kevo, Finland. This EMCCD were developed at the Institute for Space-Earth Environmental Research (ISEE), Nagoya University, in order to investigate the dynamics of the upper atmosphere through nocturnal airglow emissions. Collaborators of this organization: Finnish Meteorological Institute (FMI).
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: Please contact the principal investigator (PI), Prof. K. Shiokawa (shiokawa at isee.nagoya-u.ac.jp) before using the data. This OMTIs site is cooperatd with Finnish Meteorological Institute (FMI).
